name: Calca Document
summary: Learn about .CALCA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Calca works similar to a markdown text editor, except it can solve equations and simplify complex expressions as you type. Calca previously used the .TXT extension for its documents but switched to the CALCA extension in 2014.

description: Document created and used by Calca, a symbolic editor that calculates math problems in real time; contains plain text, which includes mathematical equations with variables, functions, and matrices.
